prompt: Design a dark-themed forgot password screen with a sophisticated appearance. Use a dark background (Colors.grey[900]) with white and light gray text for contrast. The main title 'Reset Your Password' should be in white with large, bold typography. Include a subtitle in light gray (Colors.grey[300]) explaining the reset process. Create an email input field with dark styling - dark fill color (Colors.grey[800]), white text, and light gray borders. The submit button should have a vibrant accent color (Colors.teal) with rounded corners (borderRadius: 8). Add a subtle 'Remember your password?' link at the bottom in teal color. Use a Card widget with dark theme and elevation for a layered appearance. Space elements with consistent 20px margins for visual hierarchy.
